column5: Hello there...  Anyone here have one of those motor scooters with 49cc ?  My main question is regarding insurance.  How much is it per year?  I have been told it is under $200 PER YEAR for motorbike with 49cc or under.  How about 125cc engine? insurance cost, anyone have any experience?  Is this true?  How much are you paying for yours?  Which manufacturer / model do you have ?   I was thinking of one of those Yamaha scooters.
Friends don't let friends ride scooters>>>>   http://www.harley-davidson.com/wcm/Content...sp?locale=en_CA

Had a motorcycle a few years ago...insurance was about 500 if I remember for a 750.  You're best bet is to call an insurance company...the cost will vary depending on your experience, frequency of use, location etc....won't cost you anything to call an insurance company.  Oh, and what Danbo said  Maureen
